bibliographic-data.invention-title: SECURE AND EFFICIENT PAYMENT PROCESSING SYSTEM

abstract.p: A method is provided for carrying out commercial transactions. The method includes the steps of: establishing a transaction processing system on an electronic communications network
establishing an account within the transaction processing system for a corresponding account holder
obtaining from the account holder a session description of acceptable future commercial transactions related to the account
administering commercial transactions carried out via the transaction processing system
and, verifying that administered commercial transactions related to the account meet one or more of the session description.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: EFFIZIENTES UND SICHERES ZAHLUNGSVERARBEITUNGSSYSTEM
SECURE AND EFFICIENT PAYMENT PROCESSING SYSTEM
SYSTEME DE TRAITEMENT DE PAIEMENT SUR ET EFFICACE

abstract.p: A method of processing secure transactions over unsecure computer networks (50) between account holders (30) and participating merchants (20) includes generating a number of separate periodically changing non-predictable codes, and assigning unique identifiers to a number of account holders (30) such th at each identifier is associated with one of the separte periodically changing non-predictable codes. The account holders (30) are provided with tokens (23 0) that are each synchronized to generate the same periodically changing non- predictable code associated with the unique identifier assigned to the accou nt holder (30) that was provided the token (230). The codes along with identifiers are then received over the unsecure computer network (50) from buyers involved in transactions.

For each set of received codes and identifiers, the buyer is authenticated as the account holder (30) having th e corresponding identifier when the received code matches the periodically changing non-predictable code for the identifier received.

SECURE AND EFFICIENT PAYMENT PROCESSING SYSTEM
EFFIZIENTES UND SICHERES ZAHLUNGSVERARBEITUNGSSYSTEM
SYSTEME DE TRAITEMENT DE PAIEMENT SUR ET EFFICACE
SECURE AND EFFICIENT PAYMENT PROCESSING SYSTEM
EFFIZIENTES UND SICHERES ZAHLUNGSVERARBEITUNGSSYSTEM
SYSTEME DE TRAITEMENT DE PAIEMENT SUR ET EFFICACE
SAFE AND EFFICIENT PAYMENT PROCESSING SYSTEM

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a novel and improved transaction processing system on the basis of a transaction processing system and technologies for implementing a credit/debit transaction on the Internet. SOLUTION: The present invention relates to a method of processing a safe transaction between an account owner (30) and a participant merchant (20) on a low-security computer network (50), including: generating a plurality of individual codes which vary periodically and can not be predicted

and assigning a specific identifier to a plurality of account owners (30), and each of the identifiers is related to one of individual codes which vary periodically and can not be predicted, respectively. A token (230) is given to each of the account owners (30) and while synchronizing each of the tokens (230), respectively, the individual and identical code which varies periodically and can not be predicted is generated which is related to a specific identifier assigned to the account owner (30) to which the token (230) has been given.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2012,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Secure and efficient payment processing system

nplcit.text: - Japanese Patent Office "Notification of Reasons for Rejection", date of mailing, Feb. 9, 2010
Ferranti, M., "Businesses bracing for on-line transactions" , Network World Canada. DOwnsview: Mar. 27, 1998

abstract.p: A method of processing commercial transactions carried out over the Internet (50) between account holders (30) and participating merchants (20) includes receiving a purchase request (352) of a buyer from a participating merchant (20) indicating that the buyer desires to carry out a transaction with the merchant (20). The transaction includes the buyer purchasing one or more selected items (340) from the merchant (20). The buyer is authenticated (310) as an account holder (30) and transaction fulfillment data (362) is established. The transaction fulfillment data (362) indicates a delivery destination for the selected items. In turn, the transaction fulfillment data (362) is communicated to the participating merchant (20), and transaction details (384) from the participating merchant (20) are received. The transaction details (384) include a cost for the selected items. Thereafter, completion of the transaction is authorized (390) and an authorization code (392) established therefor is communicated to the participating merchant (20).

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Secure and efficient payment processing system

abstract.p: A method for carrying out commercial transactions includes establishing a transaction processing system on an electronic communications network, and establishing an account within the transaction processing system for a corresponding account holder. One or more descriptions of acceptable future commercial transactions related to the account are obtained from the account holder. Commercial transactions carried out via the transaction processing system are administered, and it is verified that administered commercial transactions related to the account meet one or more of the descriptions obtained.

The transaction includes the buyer purchasing one or more selected items (340) from the merchant (20). The buyer is authenticated (310) as an account holder (30) and transaction fulfillment data (362) is established. The transaction fulfillment data (362) indicates a delivery destination for the selected items. bibliographic-data.invention-title: SECURE AND EFFICIENT PAYMENT PROCESSING SYSTEM
SYSTEME DE TRAITEMENT DE PAIEMENT SUR ET EFFICACE

abstract.p: A method of processing secure transactions over unsecure computer networks (50) between account holders (30) and participating merchants (20) includes generating a number of separate periodically changing non-predictable codes, and assigning unique identifiers to a number of account holders (30) such that each identifier is associated with one of the separte periodically changing non-predictable codes. The account holders (30) are provided with tokens (230) that are each synchronized to generate the same periodically changing non-predictable code associated with the unique identifier assigned to the account holder (30) that was provided the token (230). The codes along with identifiers are then received over the unsecure computer network (50) from buyers involved in transactions.

For each set of received codes and identifiers, the buyer is authenticated as the account holder (30) having the corresponding identifier when the received code matches the periodically changing non-predictable code for the identifier received.

L'invention concerne un procédé permettant d'effectuer des transactions sûres sur des réseaux informatiques (50) peu sûrs, entre des détenteurs de compte (30) et des commerçants participants (20). Ce procédé consiste à produire un certain nombre de codes séparés non prévisibles changeant périodiquement, et à affecter des identificateurs uniques à un certain nombre de détenteurs de compte (30), de sorte que chaque identificateur est associé à l'un de ces codes. On attribue des jetons (230) aux détenteurs de compte (30), chacun de ces jetons étant synchronisé de façon à générer le même code séparé non prévisible changeant périodiquement associé à l'identificateur unique attribué au détenteur de compte (30) qui détient ledit jeton (230).

Les codes ainsi que les identificateurs d'acheteurs impliqués dans des transactions sont ensuite reçus sur le réseau informatique (50) peu sûr. Pour chaque ensemble de code et d'identificateur reçus, l'acheteur est identifié comme étant le détenteur de compte (30) ayant l'identificateur correspondant, lorsque le code reçu correspond au code séparé non prévisible changeant périodiquement de l'identificateur reçu.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SECURE AND EFFICIENT PAYMENT PROCESSING SYSTEM
SYSTEME DE TRAITEMENT DE PAIEMENT SUR ET EFFICACE
